players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I have important information: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, your accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to divert suspicion from yourself. Why are you so eager to frame me without any evidence?"
Charlie: "I understand Bob's denial, but I was the one who investigated him last night and confirmed he is the mafioso. Diana, do you have any thoughts or evidence to share before we vote?"
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't add up. Why reveal your investigation results so openly? If you were truly the detective, you’d be more cautious. I suspect you’re trying to manipulate the vote."

players.name: Charlie
